headline: Circle Internet Aces Its First Earnings Test.  The Stock Is Rising.
summary: Circle Internet Group  has been riding an enormous wave of momentum.  Shares of the stablecoin company—it issues USD Coin, which is pegged to the U.S. dollar—have more than quintupled since their initial public offering in June.  The passage of the Genius Act in Washington, which provides more regulatory clarity for stablecoins, creates the potential for more gains.

raw.headline: Circle Internet Aces Its First Earnings Test.  The Stock Is Rising.

The passage of the Genius Act in Washington, which provides more regulatory clarity for stablecoins, creates the potential for more gains.

headline: Paxos is applying to become a US bank — Here’s why that matters
summary: Paxos joins Circle and Ripple to apply for a US banking charter. The company issues stablecoins for clients, including PayPal. Only one crypto company holds a US banking charter.

headline: Paxos seeks national trust bank charter in US
summary: If granted, the national trust charter would subject Paxos to oversight by the OCC in the US.
